title: Aesop's Fable the Tortoise and the Hare/Book and Cd-Rom
description: The race between the slow-and-steady tortoise and the hurry-up hare has entertained children for countless generations. This multimedia retelling includes dozens of hilarious new twists that make the story fresh, enchanting, and full of ideas. Told in English and Spanish. Full color.
author: Mark Schlichting
